project.name: raimei.js API
project.description: The raimei.js API: a library for doing WebAudio

params.name: type
params.description:
wave type 0 ~ 4, default is Oscillator.SINE: 0
Oscillator.SINE: 0
Oscillator.SQUARE: 1
Oscillator.SAWTOOTH: 2
Oscillator.TRIANGLE: 3
Oscillator.CUSTOM: 4
